overview.purpose: Simulation/experiment pipelines for research (toy models, experiment runners, provenance utilities).

files.description: Research-oriented toy simulation harness. Seeded RNG (numpy), modular methods (consciousness, quantum, biology, social, patterns, temporal). Exports results.json and REPORT.md.
Provenance writer and IO helpers (write_run_manifest, write_jsonl).
Folder containing higher-level frameworks; many files were archived due to speculative claims and replaced by stubs.

next_steps_recommendations: Add a smoke test that runs ultimate_simulation_optimized.py and asserts results.json and run_manifest.json are produced.
Systematically archive any remaining non-empirical framework files and replace them with stubs.
Add CI checks to detect banned phrases like '100%', 'perfect', 'ultimate' in code and generated outputs.
